thread.title: Steph Curry was on the wrong end of James Johnson’s posterizing dunk
thread.title_full: Steph Curry was on the wrong end of James Johnson’s posterizing dunk

author: Mark Sandritter
title: Steph Curry was on the wrong end of James Johnson’s posterizing dunk
text:
Curry tried to draw the charge. It didn’t work.
Stephen Curry often finds himself in the middle of NBA highlights. Usually, however, he isn’t on this side of the highlight.
Miami’s James Johnson aggressively attacked the rim trying to beat the buzzer. Curry rotated over to try and draw the charge. It was a valiant effort, but the referees must have determined he had his feet on the restricted area line.
So instead of drawing the charge, Curry ends up on a poster.
